## LightModel.isTexCoordSrcLocationUsed() method

Checks if the specified texture coordinate location is being used

**Signature:**

```typescript
isTexCoordSrcLocationUsed(loc: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  loc | number | The texture coordinate location |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if the texture coordinate location is being used
